context: Hi there! I'm well thanks And yourself?
I'm good! Are you looking for a movie to watch? I might be able to help.
Yes actually. I really enjoyed the movie The Color Purple (1985). Know any similar movies? I also really liked Beloved (1998)
resp: Those are great movies! If you are looking for a movie with a civil rights lean, maybe Driving Miss Daisy (1989) And, Amistad (1997) was a powerful movie.
